description: The main plaza of Fish-Man Island where major events and gatherings take place. This is where the battle between the Straw Hat Pirates and the New Fish-Man Pirates occurs.

keyEvents.title: Kurosai FR-U IV Debut
keyEvents.description: Franky debuts the Kurosai FR-U IV at Gyoncorde Plaza, using it to trample through enemy forces.
keyEvents.significance: First use of the Sunny's secret weapon in a major battle location.

keyEvents.title: Brachio Tank V Debut
keyEvents.description: The Brachio Tank V is deployed at Gyoncorde Plaza to combat the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Second secret weapon revealed at this battle location.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Tames Surume
keyEvents.description: Luffy re-tames Surume the kraken at Gyoncorde Plaza, turning Hody's trump card against him.
keyEvents.significance: Major tactical victory for the Straw Hats at this location.

culturalSignificance: Central gathering place for Fish-Man Island's citizens and the site of major conflicts during the Fish-Man Island Arc.
